body:
Every now and then we talk about removing support for the generation of dotkit files, as apparently they have been deprecated on new machines at LLNL and no other site uses them :slightly_smiling_face: 
 
This PR takes a stab at it by:

- [x] Removing all the code to generate dotkit files
- [x] Removing shell integration with dotkit
- [x] Removing references of dotkit from the docs
- [x] Removing references of dotkit from `setup-env-test.sh`
title: Remove support for generating dotkit files
